mapper.select: SELECT STATE FROM TD_CUST_INFO WHERE MERCHANT_CODE=#{merchantCode}

SELECT a.*,t.*, c.SCAN_COPY_PATH as businessLicenseFPath, c2.SCAN_COPY_PATH as openAccountPath, c1.SCAN_COPY_PATH as idCardFPath, c1.CERTIFY_BEGIN_TIME , c1.CERTIFY_END_TIME, c3.SCAN_COPY_PATH as bankCardPhotoPath, c4.SCAN_COPY_PATH as idCardScPhotoPath, a.representative_cert_no as representativeCertNo, a.REPRESENTATIVE_NAME as representativeName, a.representative_addr as custAdd, p.product_code, p.sign_rate FROM td_login_user_info t LEFT JOIN td_cust_info a ON t.cust_id = a.cust_id LEFT JOIN td_customer_product_info p ON a.MERCHANT_CODE = p.merchant_code
LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c ON t.cust_id = c.cust_id and c.CERTIFY_TYPE ='02' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c1 ON t.cust_id = c1.cust_id and c1.CERTIFY_TYPE='04' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c2 ON t.cust_id = c2.cust_id and c2.CERTIFY_TYPE='03' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c3 ON t.cust_id = c3.cust_id and c3.CERTIFY_TYPE='10' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c4 ON t.cust_id = c4.cust_id and c4.CERTIFY_TYPE='11' WHERE a.merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TD_AUDIT_RECODE_INFO WHERE MERCHANT_CODE=#{merchantCode} AND AUDIT_TYPE=#{auditType}
mapper.update: UPDATE TD_CUST_INFO C, TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO U, TD_MERCHANT_APPLY_INFO A,TD_CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_INFO P SET C.STATE=#{custStatus},U.STATE=#{userStatus},A.APPLY_STATUS=#{applyStatus},P.SIGN_STATUS=#{custStatus} WHERE C.MERCHANT_CODE=#{merchantId} AND C.CUST_ID=U.CUST_ID AND C.MERCHANT_CODE = A.AGENT_ID AND C.MERCHANT_CODE = P.MERCHANT_CODE;
mapper.select: SELECT t.bank_code, t.bank_type, t.bank_name, t.my_bank_type, t.city_code, t.ccpc, t.order_by FROM tb_bank_code t WHERE t.bank_name = #{bankCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT p.product_code, p.sign_rate FROM td_customer_product_info p LEFT JOIN td_cust_info c ON p.merchant_code = c.merchant_code WHERE c.merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
